Text: Try this: right click /open in new tab/ usual boxes appear from there. Works for me in Firefox.
D'oh! Forgot to mention right click on the MAGNET LINK.

Open uTorrent, copy magnet link location (clik right mouse copy) in utorrent
FILE-->Add torrent by url--->Paste
enjoy

Thanks to all for help

no problem here on the clicky thingy with utorrent but glad people are watching out for that kind of thing :)

thanks for the up ... fab vinyl rip :)
